title: Self-Regulated Learning and Innovative Teaching Methodology Workshop to Improve MOOC Participation Strategies

context.additional_context: A program for current practitioners to acquire MOOC participation strategies in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can implement three self-regulated learning strategies on MOOC platforms
Learners can design online communication strategies to collaborate with peer learners and educators
Learners can apply two innovative instructional methods to sustain engagement in MOOC courses

resources: Smartphone and Mobile MOOC Platform Access Tool
Social Media Guidelines for Collaborative Learning
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
